original_text: Then answered Amos, and said to Amaziah, I was no prophet, neither was I a prophet's son; but I was an herdman, and a gatherer of sycomore fruit:
korean_text: 아모스가 아마샤에게 대답하여 이르되 나는 선지자가 아니며 선지자의 아들도 아니라 나는 목자요 뽕나무를 재배하는 자로서

sentences.original_text: Then answered Amos, and said to Amaziah,
neither was I a prophet's son;
and a gatherer of sycomore fruit:
